snippet: Investors were looking ahead to Friday’s payroll report, which could provide guidance on when the Fed will raise interest raise.
abstract: Stocks manage meager gains ahead of United States monthly jobs report.
lead_paragraph: Investors were looking ahead to Friday’s payroll report, which could provide guidance on when the Fed will raise interest raise.

headline.main: Market Is Sluggish as a New Quarter Begins
headline.print_headline: A Sluggish Start to the New Quarter
